description: Number of one-sided hexagonal polyominoes with n cells.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_. a(13) from Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)uni-bielefeld.de) Feb 15 1999.
